<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>AZ DataSilos - incident - Data Fix</name><order>1</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	
	var RenderValue = x_snc_devtools.RenderValue;
	var GetStringValue = x_snc_devtools.GetStringValue;

		Debug('AZ DataSilos - incident - Data Fix:'+RenderValue(current));

	
	if (GetStringValue(current.sys_class_name) == 'Incident')
	{
		Debug('AZ DataSilos - incident - Data Fix: sys_class_name == "Incident": '+RenderValue(current));	
		current.sys_class_name = 'incident';
	}
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_R3EXUVB</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-14 12:15:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5504eba01b78f098a11210669b4bcb4f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AZ DataSilos - incident - Data Fix</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="DataSilosAZ WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_datasilosaz">044532c1db429410ba15a35305961966</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="DataSilosAZ WORK IN PROGRESS">044532c1db429410ba15a35305961966</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5504eba01b78f098a11210669b4bcb4f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_R3EXUVB</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-15 08:56:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5504eba01b78f098a11210669b4bcb4f"/></record_update>
